Name: PRIMARY
Comments: Carried forward from L2 FITS file. Append BJDTDB; RV; RVERR; BERV; RVMETHOD; and SYSVEL header keywords.

Name: INSTRUMENT_HEADER
Comments: Carried forward from L2 FITS file.

Name: RECEIPT
Description: Table of operations that have been performed on this file
Comments: Table has columns: time; code release; branch name; commit hash; function; args; status.

Name: DRP_CONFIG
Description: Pipeline details (settings etc) to go from native data to L2
Comments: Table has one column where each row captures a config entry.

Name: EXT_DESCRIPT
Description: Table describing contents of each extension
Comments: Table has two columns and each one row contains the name of an extension in the HDU and then a string description of what is in that extension.

Name: RV1
Comments: Required Columns: BJD_TDB (64bit); RV from Trace1...N; RV_Error; BC_Velocity; Wave_Start (64bit); Wave_End (64bit). Optional columns [teams can add more if they like]: pixel_start; pixel_end; order_index; echelle_order; weight; residual_drift.

Name: CCF1
Description: CCFs from which RV1...N were derived
Comments: Same shape as RV1...N. Contains the CCF(s) that produced each RV1...N value.

Name: DIAGNOSTICS1
Comments: Table containing useful diagnostic measurements. Does not have same dimensions as RV1/CCF1. Suggested structure is to have columns for : BJD_TDB; metric_name; value; and error.

Name: CUSTOM_CCF1
Comments: Additional CCF extensions; used to capture results from different masks or different CCF calculation methods.

Name: CUSTOM_RV1
Description: Derived Radial Velocity Measurement from CUSTOM_CCF1...N
Comments: Additional RV extensions; used to capture RV values corresponding to CUSTOM_CCF1...N
